title: 1.12.2的ESSX插件的几个问题
author: piao_xue
txt_content:
1.我装上ESSX插件（全套的）之后指令就不认识英文ID了，必须输数字ID，很不方便
怎么让他支持英文ID
改哪个配置
2.开服时提示GeoIP数据库读取失败，提示如下
> [16:17:44] [Server thread/ERROR]: GeoIP数据库读取失败!  java.io.FileNotFoundException: plugins/EssentialsGeoIP/GeoIP2-Country.mmdb (No such file or directory)  at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open0(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_212]  at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(RandomAccessFile.java:316) ~[?:1.8.0_212]  at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(RandomAccessFile.java:243) ~[?:1.8.0_212]  at [JavaPlugin.class:git-CatServerAsync-1.12.2-be22981]  at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.enablePlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:328) [JavaPluginLoader.class:git-CatServerAsync-1.12.2-be22981]  at 3.开服之后XMPP不时报错
> [16:18:08] [Server thread/WARN]: [Essentials] Task #16 for Essentials v2.17.1.60 generated an exception  java.lang.NullPointerException: null  at com.earth2me.essentials.xmpp.XMPPManager.updatePresence(XMPPManager.java:146) ~[?:?]  at com.earth2me.essentials.xmpp.EssentialsXMPP.updatePresence(EssentialsXMPP.java:113) ~[?:?]  at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:76) ~[CraftTask.class:git-CatServerAsync-1.12.2-be22981]  at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:421) [CraftScheduler.class:git-CatServerAsync-1.12.2-be22981]  at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:835) [MinecraftServer.class:?]  at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:473) [nz.class:?]  at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:780) [MinecraftServer.class:?]  at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:634) [MinecraftServer.class:?]  at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) [?:1.8.0_212] 
装了这些插件

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
1.用旧版本的ess
2.删除geoip 没什么用 基本用不到
3.删除xmpp 理由同上

replies.author: piao_xue
replies.txt_content:

3.删除xmpp 理由同上
